events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a collision involving their vehicle and another car on the highway.
Claim categorised under Auto Accident due to the keywords detected including vehicle and collision.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage this case and guide the customer.
Customer received formal acknowledgement of the claim with details on expected processing times and next steps.
Request sent to customer for photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police accident report for review.
Customer provided photographs of the car damage and uploaded the police report through the online portal.
Investigation team has begun analyzing submitted documents and contacted witnesses to verify the accident details.
Investigation completed confirming fault with the other driver; damage assessment report finalized without discrepancies.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering full vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses during repair period.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely updates and the fairness of the proposed settlement terms.
Claim officially approved by the claims manager following positive feedback and verification of the settlement offer.
Settlement payment was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s bank account covering all approved damages and expenses.
The claim was successfully closed after confirmation that all payments were received and the vehicle was repaired.
All documentation and correspondence related to this auto accident claim have been archived in the system.
